body:
I just started facing this issue, after upgrading to Go 1.7beta1:

```

go version go1.6.2 darwin/amd64
% go vet ./...
% go version
go version go1.7beta1 darwin/amd64

previously imported as:
	var Reader io.Reader
```

Should I open a new issue?
